hero_subtitle: A secure and elegant space to capture your ideas, organize your life, and express your creativity.
about_us_text: Note Creep is not just a note-taking app; it's your digital sanctuary. We believe that your thoughts are the most powerful tool you possess, and our mission is to provide a secure and beautiful platform for you to nurture them. With a focus on simplicity, privacy, and seamless user experience, we've built a home for your ideas, big and small. Our commitment is to protect your data and empower your creativity, making sure every note you take is safe, organized, and truly yours.
services_subtitle: From simple lists to complex projects, we have the tools you need to stay on top of everything.
service_1_text: Our clean, modern interface makes it easy to focus on your thoughts without distractions.
service_2_text: Access your notes from any device, anywhere, and anytime. Your data is always with you.
service_3_text: We use end-to-end encryption to ensure your private notes remain completely secure.
faq_1_answer: Note Creep is a secure, elegant, and feature-rich note-taking application designed to help you organize your thoughts and capture your ideas seamlessly across all your devices.
faq_2_answer: Yes, your privacy is our top priority. We use industry-standard end-to-end encryption to ensure that your notes are accessible only to you.
faq_3_question: Can I use it on multiple devices?

faq_5_answer: You can reach out to our support team via the email provided in the feedback section. We're here to help you with any questions or issues you might have.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our services. We value your trust and we are committed to ensuring transparency. By using our website or any of our services, you agree to the practices outlined here. Please read this document carefully, as it describes not only what we do with your data but also your rights and responsibilities as a user.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.body: When you interact with our platform, we may collect different types of information to ensure smooth service delivery. This includes details that identify you, data that relates to your activities, and technical information about your devices. We collect this data through forms, automated processes, and cookies. Our aim is always to enhance your experience, not to intrude upon your privacy.
section1.li1: Personal identifiers such as your full name, email address, phone number, and demographic details you provide.
section1.li2: Account information such as usernames, passwords, and authentication logs.
section1.li3: Usage data including your browsing patterns, time spent on pages, and clicked elements.
section1.li4: Device and technical data like IP address, browser type, operating system, and screen resolution.
section1.li5: Cookies and tracking technologies used to remember your preferences and improve website performance.(Currently we are not using it)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.body: The information collected is used to provide, personalize, and improve our services. We use data to ensure smooth functionality, communicate effectively, and maintain security. Additionally, some information is used to comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal data to third parties. Our primary goal is to provide you with a safe and seamless experience.
section2.li1: To provide and maintain services efficiently.
section2.li2: To improve the quality and reliability of features.
section2.li3: To personalize your experience based on preferences.
section2.li4: To monitor and prevent fraudulent activities.
section2.li5: To comply with regulations and protect our legal rights.
section2.li6: To deliver important updates, notifications, and promotional offers.

section3.title: 3. Sharing of Information
section3.body: We respect your privacy and limit sharing of your personal data. However, under certain circumstances, we may disclose information. These include sharing with trusted organization or governments. We take strong measures to ensure that third parties like (government) handle your data with confidentiality and security.

section4.title: 4. Data Storage and Retention
section4.body: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Once data is no longer required, it is securely deleted or anonymized. Storage is managed using encrypted databases and industry-standard security practices.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: As a valued user, you have certain rights concerning your personal data. These rights empower you to stay in control of your information. You may exercise them anytime by contacting us.
section5.li1: Right to access – You may request details of the personal data we hold.
section5.li2: Right to update – You can correct or update inaccurate information.
section5.li3: Right to delete – You may request deletion of personal data, subject to legal requirements.
section5.li4: Right to restrict – You can limit how we process your data under certain conditions. (You can limit data processing in paid services.)
section5.li5: Right to opt-out – You can opt out of marketing communications and non-essential cookies.(Not applicable currently)

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
section6.body: Cookies help us improve your browsing experience by remembering your preferences, storing session details, and analyzing trends. You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect some functionalities but will not block access to our services. Again we do not use cookies for our core functionality. So you can disable it without any issue.

section7.title: 7. Security Measures
section7.body: We implement industry-standard security measures, including encryption, firewalls, and secure access protocols, to protect your data. However, no online platform can guarantee 100% security. We encourage users to maintain strong passwords and be cautious while sharing personal data online.

section8.title: 8. Children’s Privacy
section8.body: Our services are mainly for taking notes and organizing tasks or information. It will not affect children directly. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 10 years of age without parental consent. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected such data, we will promptly delete it. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided us with personal information without consent should contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.body: Your information may be transferred and processed outside your home country. By using our services, you consent to such transfers, provided adequate safeguards are in place to protect your data.

section10.title: 10. Updates to this Policy
section10.body: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in practices, technologies, or legal requirements. Updates will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be communicated directly to you.

section11.title: 11. Contact Us
section11.body: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about this Privacy Policy or data practices, please contact us at alrifatsabbir@gmail.com. We take your privacy seriously and will respond promptly.

section12.title: 12. Final Notes
section12.body: By continuing to use our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to this Privacy Policy. We are committed to protecting your information and maintaining your trust.

privacyPolicy.closing: Thank you for trusting us with your personal data. Your privacy is our responsibility, and we will continue to improve our practices to safeguard your information.

securityPolicy.title: Security Policy
securityPolicy.intro: We prioritize the security of our users and their data. This Security Policy outlines the measures we take to protect information, systems, and services from unauthorized access, misuse, or compromise.

section1.title: 1. Data Protection
section1.body: We implement industry-standard safeguards to protect the personal information you provide. This includes encryption, secure storage, and controlled access to ensure data confidentiality and integrity.

section2.title: 2. Account Security
section2.body: Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their accounts. Strong passwords and multi-factor authentication (MFA) are encouraged. Sharing account credentials is prohibited.

section3.title: 3. Network Security
section3.body: Our networks are protected with firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and regular security audits. We continuously monitor for suspicious activity and respond to potential threats promptly.

section4.title: 4. Application Security
section4.body: All applications undergo rigorous testing, including vulnerability assessments and penetration tests. Updates and patches are applied regularly to minimize security risks.

section5.title: 5. Data Breach Response
section5.body: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we follow strict incident response procedures, notify affected users promptly, and cooperate with relevant authorities to mitigate any impact.

section6.title: 6. Employee Training
section6.body: Our employees undergo regular security awareness training, including best practices for password management, phishing prevention, and secure data handling.

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Services
section7.body: We carefully select third-party vendors that adhere to high security standards. Contracts include security requirements to ensure the protection of user data.

section8.title: 8. Physical Security
section8.body: Data centers and offices are equipped with restricted access, surveillance, and other physical security measures to prevent unauthorized entry.

section9.title: 9. Updates and Policy Changes
section9.body: We may update this Security Policy to address new threats or technological changes. Users are encouraged to review it periodically. Continued use of the Services indicates acceptance of the latest policy.

securityPolicy.thanks: Thank you for trusting us with your security. For questions, contact alrifatsabbir@gmail.com.

features.title: Amazing Features of Note Creep
features.subtitle: Discover the key features that make Note Creep the ultimate note-taking app. Designed for productivity, simplicity, and seamless organization of your thoughts, ideas, and tasks.

sections.title: Efficient Note Management
paragraphs: Organize your notes with ease. Create, edit, delete, and categorize notes effortlessly to keep your information structured and easy to access.
Quick search and filtering options ensure you can find any note instantly, saving time and increasing productivity.

sections.title: Rich Text Editing
paragraphs: Note Creep provides a powerful rich text editor that allows you to format your notes with bold, italics, headings, lists, links, and more.
Enhance your notes with images, code snippets, and checklists for maximum clarity and organization.

sections.title: Cross-Device Sync
paragraphs: Access your notes anywhere, anytime. All your notes are automatically synced across devices for uninterrupted productivity.
Whether on desktop, tablet, or mobile, your notes are always up-to-date.

sections.title: Secure and Private
paragraphs: Your privacy is our priority. Notes are encrypted and securely stored, ensuring that only you can access your information.
Optional password protection and secure authentication provide an extra layer of safety for sensitive notes.

sections.title: Smart Organization Tools
paragraphs: Keep your thoughts organized with smart tools like tags, folders, and reminders. Never lose track of important notes or deadlines.
Intuitive dashboards help you visualize your notes and stay productive every day.

features.conclusion: Most of these features aren't available in free plan. Upgrade to Pro or Enterprise for advanced features and enhanced productivity. Also, paid plans aren't available currently.

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing Plans for Note Taking App
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your note-taking needs. From individuals starting to large teams, we have options to support your productivity.

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: Ideal for small teams who want more advanced features.

pricing.conclusion: Start with the Free plan to organize your notes today, and upgrade when you need more advanced features. Currently paid plans aren't available.
